charities.name: Make A Wish Tri-Counties
charities.hours: Monday: 24 Hours, Tuesday: 24 Hours, Wednesday: 24 Hours, Thursday: 24 Hours, Friday: 24 Hours, Saturday: 24 Hours, Sunday: 24 Hours
charities.mission: This one belief guides us in everything we do at Make-A-Wish. It inspires us to grant life-changing wishes for children going through so much. It compels us to be creative in exceeding the expectations of every wish kid. It drives us to make our donated resources go as far as possible. Most of all, it's the founding principle of our vision to grant the wish of every eligible child.
